metadata.title: CVE-2023-35788 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - high
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in fl_set_geneve_opt in net/sched/cls_flower.c inthe Linux kernel before 6.3.7. It allows an out-of-bounds write in theflower classifier code via TCA_FLOWER_KEY_ENC_OPTS_GENEVE packets. This mayresult in denial of service or privilege escalation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-35788` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-153-generic - 5.4.0-153.170
linux-image-5.4.0-153-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-153.170
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-153-generic - 5.4.0-153.170
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-153-lowlatency - 5.4.0-153.170
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-76-generic - 5.15.0-76.83~20.04.1
